meaningMnemonic: The <kanji>water</kanji> <kanji>deep</kanji>ness is the <vocabulary>water depth</vocabulary>. You should check this before diving into the water so you don't hit your face.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
